meanings.definition: To stamp (a mark or design) on the back of something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys backstamping her initials on her books.
meanings.sent2: The artist is backstamping his logo on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried backstamping its paw on the wet paint.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to backstamp a lasting impression on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the backstamping machine echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The act of stamping a mark or design on the back of something.
meanings.sent1: The backstamping of the company logo was done with precision.
meanings.sent2: He collected rare coins with unique backstampings.
meanings.sent3: The backstamping process seemed like a secret ritual to the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a backstamping of joy on her face.
meanings.sent5: The backstamping on the antique mirror revealed its age.
